Column {data-width=350 .sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


```{r}
# First input selector
  # View by sector or by hazard category
selectInput(inputId = "type",
            label = "Type",
            choices = c("Hazard overview",
                        "Hazard category",
                        "Sector"))

# Second input selectors -------------------------------------------------------

# Options for sector
output$sector <- renderUI({
  if(input$type == "Sector")
    selectInput(inputId = "sector",
                label = "Sector",
                choices = c("Aquaculture",
                            "Fisheries",
                            "Livestock",
                            "Crops"))
})

# Options for hazard category
output$category <- renderUI({
  if(input$type == "Hazard category")
    selectInput(inputId = "category",
                label = "Hazard category",
                choices = c("Biological",
                            "Chemical",
                            "Physical",
                            "Socio-economic"))
})

# Display by sector or impact
output$fill <- renderUI({
  if(input$type %in% c("Hazard overview", "Hazard category")){
    selectInput(inputId = "fill",
                label = "Fill by sector or impact",
                choices = c("Sector",
                            "Impact"))
  }
})

# Render UIs
uiOutput("category")
uiOutput("fill")
uiOutput("sector")
```

### Plot

```{r}
# Import synthetic data --------------------------------------------------------

# Import
hazard_scores <- read_xlsx(here::here("data",
                                      "data_structure.xlsx")) %>% data.table()

updated_data <- reactive({
  if(input$type  == "Sector"){
    hazard_scores[Sector %in% input$sector]
  } else if(input$type == "Hazard category"){
    hazard_scores[Category %in% input$category]
  } else if(input$type == "Hazard overview")
    hazard_scores
})


# Colour palettes --------------------------------------------------------------

## Sector =====

sector_cols <- c("#56B4E9",
                          "#009E73",
                          "#0072B2",
                          "#F0E442")
                          
names(sector_cols) <- c("Aquaculture",
                        "Crops",
                        "Fisheries",
                        "Livestock")

## Hazard category =====

category_cols <- c("#CC6677",
                            "#44AA99",
                            "#6699CC",
                            "#AA4499")

names(category_cols) <- c("Biological",
                            "Chemical",
                            "Physical",
                            "Socio-economic")

## Impact ====

impact_cols <- c("#DDCC77",
                          "#882255",
                          "#117733",
                          "#88CCEE")
                          
names(impact_cols) <- c("Food production",
                        "Human health",
                        "Natural environment",
                        "Climate change")

# Plots
of_plot <- reactive({
  if(input$type == "Sector"){
    ggplot(data = updated_data(), aes(x = Category, y = Score, fill = Category)) +
      geom_col() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = category_cols) +
      theme_light() +
      theme(text = element_text(size = 20),
            legend.position = "none")
  } else if(input$type == "Hazard category" &&
            input$fill == "Sector"){
    ggplot(data = updated_data()) +
      geom_hline(yintercept = seq(0, 90, 10), colour = "darkgrey") +
      geom_bar(aes(x = str_wrap(Hazard, 5), y = Score, fill = Sector), stat = "identity", alpha = 0.8) +
      coord_polar() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = sector_cols) +
      scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100), expand = c(0, 10)) +
      coord_polar() +
      theme_light() +
      theme(axis.text.y = element_blank(),
            axis.ticks = element_blank(),
            axis.title = element_blank(),
            panel.grid = element_blank(),
            legend.position = "bottom",
            text = element_text(size = 20))
  } else if(input$type == "Hazard category" &&
            input$fill == "Impact"){
     ggplot(data = updated_data()) +
      geom_hline(yintercept = seq(0, 90, 10), colour = "darkgrey") +
      geom_bar(aes(x = str_wrap(Hazard, 5), y = Score, fill = Impact), stat = "identity", alpha = 0.8) +
      coord_polar() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = impact_cols) +
      scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100), expand = c(0, 10)) +
      coord_polar() +
      theme_light() +
      theme(axis.text.y = element_blank(),
            axis.ticks = element_blank(),
            axis.title = element_blank(),
            panel.grid = element_blank(),
            legend.position = "bottom",
            text = element_text(size = 20))
  } else if(input$type == "Hazard overview" &&
            input$fill == "Sector"){
    ggplot(data = updated_data()) +
      geom_hline(yintercept = seq(0, 400, 100), colour = "darkgrey") +
      geom_bar(aes(x = Category, y = Score, fill = Sector), stat = "identity", alpha = 0.8) +
      coord_polar() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = sector_cols) +
      scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-10, 500), expand = c(0, 50)) +
      coord_polar() +
      theme_light() +
      ggtitle("Hazard categories by sector") +
      theme(axis.text.y = element_blank(),
            axis.ticks = element_blank(),
            axis.title = element_blank(),
            panel.grid = element_blank(),
            legend.position = "bottom",
            text = element_text(size = 20))
  } else if(input$type == "Hazard overview" &&
            input$fill == "Impact"){
    ggplot(data = updated_data()) +
      geom_hline(yintercept = seq(0, 400, 100), colour = "darkgrey") +
      geom_bar(aes(x = Category, y = Score, fill = Impact), stat = "identity", alpha = 0.8) +
      coord_polar() +
      scale_fill_manual(values = impact_cols) +
      scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-10, 500), expand = c(0, 50)) +
      coord_polar() +
      theme_light() +
      ggtitle("Hazard categories by sector") +
      theme(axis.text.y = element_blank(),
            axis.ticks = element_blank(),
            axis.title = element_blank(),
            panel.grid = element_blank(),
            legend.position = "bottom",
            text = element_text(size = 20))
  }
})

# Plot
renderPlot({
    of_plot()
})
```
